Alias.name: kalendarz
Alias.script:
local kal_komenda, kal_param
if not kal_wariant then kal_wariant = 0 end
kal_komenda = getCmdLine() kal_param = string.split(kal_komenda, " ")
if kal_param[2] then kal_wariant = tonumber(kal_param[2]) end
send("czas") send("ob niebo") tempTimer(0.5, [[ predykcje_astro() ]])
